text: Lauren Graham (born March 16, 1967) is an American actress, producer and novelist. She played Lorelai Gilmore on Gilmore Girls. She played Sarah Braverman in the TV series Parenthood. Graham was born in Honolulu, Hawaii. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from Hawaii Category:Actors from Honolulu Category:1967 births Category:Living people
title: Lauren Graham
